comment: Sucks it won't play movie's with subtitles

reply.author: InstantBits Inc
reply.content: What happens when you try to enable subtitles? Email me at servercast@instantbits.com for help with this issue

author: Larry Bower
comment: Awesome app

author: shellie de souza
comment: Neat.

author: Ashton Clines
comment: xbox one brian hull

author: Jax Hay
comment: Haven't had an issue since I changed to server cast from movie cast. Works great so 👍👍👍👍👍

Not sure why people here say it's better than LocalCast (at least for Chromecasting)... It plays exactly the same files (since it still depends on what the Chromecast supports or not) and the whole UI is still very young compared to the matured LocalCast. Promising though... :) I am still using LocalCast for now.

author: Nathan Prevette
comment: I love this app. Way better than the more popular Localcast. This app plays videos that no other casting app is able to do. Chromecast would show an error and not play anything or it would play the video with no sound but this app plays everything with no issues. Also the customer service is excellent. 5 stars

author: Levi Hill
comment: Havn't used this one near as much as Instant Bits Web Server Cast, but I've tried at least 10 variant options of this type of app and this and the other Web Server Cast are by and far above any others I have found. Carlos with customer inquiries was extremely helpful as well. Can't say enough about these two apps, been a whole since I was this pleased with an app.

author: Micah Holmes
comment: O Man, there's an abundance of adults who LOVE to complain😉, right? Lol .Perhaps this forum can allow for some odd regressive pouting catharsis? "Fully embrace that spoiled younger you," "Remember, you DESERVE!" mantras on the walls.....😥 😏 lol. & Even on 4+5 star reviews seems an oddly often "well, it's fine, BUT..."  Funny and I'm done....  But honestly this is by far the best casting app that I've found. And I tried so so many. Not perfect of course but this application is IMO the most functional(almost ALWAYS works...) while quite noticeably closest 2 the final goal of that idyllic CAST OF PERFECTION😔😇 that is so DESERVED....Very good app, thank you for the fine work

author: William Willett
comment: I've been using Allcast for over a year and it has a nasty habit of disconnecting from the playback device and the only way to get control back is to restart the video. I finally had enough! This app is everything I wanted, stable, fast, and clean.

author: Tony Bayliss
comment: Just started using this app I and normally use localcast but I've found this playd files that localcast cannot play or plays without sound so far so good see how it goes

Not a bad app but not great,It's very interesting to say the least how some individuals have some OTHER expectations of what an app should be rated & complain about others not giving this app a good review. According to "THEIR" language ; Supposedly most consumers on hete deserve garbage right? Lol. So ppl on here supposedly enjoy voicing their displeasure by giving out bad ratings just for the heck of it eh? Is the word "love"the type of word complacent individuals FEEL like using to describe a proper rating? this platform is perfect to complain about others complaining lol. mentally unstable mentalities who brag of others complaining should lower their expectations of others voicing their displeasure of what an app should be rated, if you don't like others low ratings? Then too bad everyones allowed to criticize if you don't like it? Then be prepared to be criticized in return, Keep standing up for your self, good for you👏😂

reply.author: InstantBits Inc
reply.content: Sorry I have no idea what you are talking about. If you need help please email me at servercast@instantbits.com

author: Alex Lopez
comment: Works as it says. Can also stream local media from your phone or SD card which similar apps can't do.... Edit- 1-22-18....had to switch phones recently and app no longer connects to Chromecast. Can't even find it. Everything is updated and Chromecast works fine since I can stream other apps to it.

reply.author: InstantBits Inc
reply.content: Does the Google home app find your chromecast? Email at servercast@instantbits.com for help with this issue

author: Khalid
comment: It seems like the only app that works with my samsung TV,  it has exactly what i want, intutive menu, just brows to the video you want and it is on your tv. Recommended

author: Edson Domingues
comment: Please include an option to select the audio. Many videos have dual audio and I cannot select one, always have to use the standard.

reply.author: InstantBits Inc
reply.content: Unfortunately most streaming devices do not support dual audio. It isn't up to the app as the app doesn't decode the video. If you have questions email me at servercast@instantbits.com

comment: I was enjoying the app except for the inability to auto forward in the sitcoms and all the ads. So when I saw a pop-up to pay for no ads on the 17th, I did. Thinking it was getting rid of all the stuff I have to go through to move forward. Here I am 5 days later, (too late for Google to refund me) they have doubled and force me to watch them by putting timers on them AND now it seems even harder to use because of???   What did I do???   I usually switch apps before I pay so I'm really disappointed.

reply.author: InstantBits Inc
reply.content: Sorry I have no idea what you are talking about. Server cast only has a tiny banner ad on the list screens and on the playback control screen. They aren't timed, they are always there. And if you have issues with premium you can just email me for a refund. My email is servercast@instantbits.com

author: Soorena Ildari
comment: Local file browser doesn't work.it assumes there is file on my phone and doesn't let me navigate through my phone.

reply.author: InstantBits Inc
reply.content: There are two ways to navigate. You can use the video list, which android provides the app, or you can use the explorer that lets you go into each directory. If you need help email me at servercast@instantbits.com

author: Seba -Willy Tanner-
comment: No SMB support. Can load subtitles from local folders but not from the DLNA server folder from where I play the video file from.

reply.author: InstantBits Inc
reply.content: Smb support is already on the next beta. If you have questions email me at servercast@instantbits.com

author: Amit Gupta
comment: Getting playback failure always on my moto g turbo

reply.author: InstantBits Inc
reply.content: Email me at servercast@instantbits.com for help with this issue

author: Kelvin Jones
comment: I cannt pause or stop videos I have to reset my phone all the time to stop. And there's gay advertising sorry but unexpectable

reply.author: InstantBits Inc
reply.content: Pausing depends on the video type, the video server, and the streaming device. As far as ads, I have all adult categories disabled on all ad networks. If you are seeing ads that violate that please send me a screenshot so I can report it. My email is servercast@instantbits.com

author: Curtis Ross Jr
comment: Have tried many other cast programs. So far this one appears to be the best of them all !!!

author: David Evans
comment: Works better than any other casting app on my Samsung tablet no issues whatever I want from it it delivers

comment: Does exactly what i wanted to do! Perfect, and do far i think it's free. Even if i had to pay, i would!

author: Random Vidz
comment: Been looking for an app to mirror my tablet, no luck but i found this app among other popular app that does not work on my samsung tab.  Been searching for 3 hours but thank you Server Cast, will be buying app soon. Give it a 4 star because the video i was watching it keep saying please wait loading then i would go back to the app wake it and the movie plays again......

author: Hard Boner
comment: Love this app no buffering no skips plays as smooth as silk best app that i have tried so far with my chromecast also loads quickly and easy to operate
